publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7663 Charlie Gordon: Proposed Reduction in Coastguard Stations in Scotlandâ€”That the Parliament rejects the current proposal of the UK Government to reduce the number of coastguard stations in Scotland as a reckless measure that would put lives at risk.

S3M-7663 Proposed Reduction in Coastguard Stations in Scotland (lodged on 23 December 2010) Mary Mulligan*, Bill Butler*, Helen Eadie*, Stewart Maxwell*, Patricia Ferguson*, Bob Doris*, John Park*, Claire Baker*, Rhona Brankin*, Des McNulty*, Bill Kidd*, Gil Paterson*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Malcolm Chisholm*
S3M-7663 Proposed Reduction in Coastguard Stations in Scotland (lodged on 23 December 2010) Jackie Baillie*, Robin Harper*, Hugh Henry*
